main.name: Ayub Otieno
main.description: Data Analyst | SQL, Tableau || Software Engineer | Python|| Passionate about building projects with positive impacts||✨
main.bio:
I am a skilled data analyst with experience in collecting, organizing, interpreting, and disseminating various types of statistical data. With my expert understanding of statistics, mathematics, and analytics in Python, Excel, SQL, Tableau, and web scraping, I can help firms drive accuracy. 
I am looking for a challenging role in an organization to utilize my technical, data analytics, and management skills in an integral, professional and adaptable manner for the growth of the organization as well as to enhance my knowledge about new and emerging trends in the IT sector with a good academic record, ability to understand and test software, working knowledge of software development and a strong understanding of core internet technologies.
main.contactmessage: You can have a talk with me here!

work.title: Mentor and Evaluator - Data Science & Business Analytics
work.description:
Mentoring and evaluating students in an Online DSBA Program.
 Evaluate, Assess and Moderate Data Science Projects.
 Provide technical expertise and/or training in variety of areas, including
introduction to python for data analysis, supervised and unsupervised
learning, Excel and SQL.

work.title: Functional / Usability Tester
work.description: Gold rated Functional Tester. Gold rated Usability Tester. Worked with 100+ products and 200+ Test Cycles. Submitted more than 200 valuable bugs

work.company:
INDEPENDENT ELECTORAL AND BOUNDARIES COMMISSION –
KENYA (IEBC) │
work.title: Kamukunji Constituency ICT (CICT)
work.description:
To provide high-quality first-level ICT support assistance to the Returning
Officer at the main tallying Centre.
 Restore normal services to the users as fast as possible by fixing technical
hitches, fulfilling service demands or answering queries to allow the users to
work effectively.
 To schedule, configure and test KIEMS kits in readiness for the elections. Perform data backup and also data restoration on KIEMS Kits.
